title: Thunderbird 102 - drafts to local folder?
content: In earlier versions of Thunderbird there was a parameter which allowed me to save drafts to a local folder, rather than to the cloud. I prepare somemany emails offline and need to be able to develop the messages without being connected to the internet. I cannot find how to do this in TB 102.
creator: rattlingroger

title: Thunderbird not asking for new passwords
content:
Thunderbird has ceased to ask for new passwords when authentication fails on my mail server. Instead, it just keeps pounding on the server which eventually blocks my IP address and then I'm stuck without email until I call my ISP support to unblock my IP. I can't just enter passwords in a field on a screen with thunderbird because there is no such screen. I have to wait for authentication to fail and then it asks for a password. This is how new accounts and password changes have always worked with thunderbird, but, apparently, not anymore.

This is driving me bonkers. Please help. I don't want to ditch thunderbird but this has got to stop, one way or another.
creator: thunderbird9

title: address book - contact info entry popup screen
content: How to customize the popup screen when entering contact info - I would like to avoid scrolling down to enter the email address - currently the pop up screen opens in the bottom right corner of the screen. I would like it to be front and center and the entire fields displayed without needing to scroll down. I'd also like to remove the fields we are not using.
creator: revolvingdoorkingston

title: Folders that Cannot be Deleted
content:
I have an Outlook email account which I manage using Thunderbird.

For reasons not known to me some strange folders have appeared in the folder list. The folders in question all have italian names and appear to be some sort of system error folders - Problemi di sincronizzazione.

I do not recognise them, they are empty and are not visible when I view the outlook account using a browser.

I would like to delete them but when I attempt to do so I get an error message "The current command did not succeed. The mail server for account Outlook responded:Command Argument Error. 11."

Any help to get rid of them would be greatly appreciated. Thanks In Advance
creator: ray.pioli

title: Thunderbird email

I also have 3 Sent folders, and some emails I send show up in 2, none in the 3rd.

title: Thinderbird and marking a folder as junk

title: Thunderbird text pixelated
content:
Good day. I am having a problem with Thunderbird 102.10.1 where all text is pixelated. I can't think of another way to describe it. This is a problem throughout all aspects of Thunderbird. All panels, toolbars, tabs, Settings, Account Settings, More Troubleshooting Information, Calendar, anything in the Thunderbird window.

This problem persists when I disable all (or any one) extension.

If I do a screen capture (Win-Shift-S) and paste the image into a graphics program the text is 'normal'. The problem is not there.

This problem goes away when I enter Troubleshoot mode.

Any help appreciated.
creator: dchapman1
